thread.title: Amitabh Bachchan To Star In Filmmaker Ayan Mukherji's "Dragon"
thread.title_full: Amitabh Bachchan To Star In Filmmaker Ayan Mukherji's "Dragon"

title: Amitabh Bachchan To Star In Filmmaker Ayan Mukherji's "Dragon"
text:
facebook 153 SHARES 
Ayan Mukherji's next film, Dragon , has been trending since the first set of news about it came out. It a superhero movie starring Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, and pictures of the two training for the film have also surfaced. But another feather to the movie's glorious cap is the entry of actor Amithabh Bachchan in the project. While the details of his role in the film have been kept under wraps, it is an important part which he is very excited about, and will start shooting in the middle of the year, says a source close to the production house. This movie just keeps getting more and more exciting, and we can't wait till they start shooting.
